specific_issues.description:
FCC 15-216-Implementation of Section 103 of the STELA Reauthorization Act of 2014; Totality of the Circumstances Test 16-42-Expanding Consumers' Video Navigation Choices 97-80-Commercial Availability of Navigation Devices 00-67-Compatibility Between Cable Systems and Consumer Electronics Equipment 03-109-In the Matter of Lifeline and Link-Up 10-90-In the Matter of Connect America Fund A National Broadband Plan for Our Future High-Cost Universal Service Support. 09-197-Telecommunications Carriers Eligible to Receive Universal Service Support 11-42-In the Matter of Federal-State Joint Board on Universal Service Lifelineand Link Up Lifeline and Link Up Reform and Modernization 13-3-Petition of USTelecom for Declaratory Ruling that Incumbent Local Exchange Carriers Are Non-Dominant in the Provision of Switched Access Services RM-10593-Request Amendment of the Commission's Rules to Reform Regulation of Local Exchange Carrier Rates for Interstate Special Access Services 05-25-In the Matter of Special Access Rates for Price Cap Local Exchange Carriers AT&T Corp. Petition for Rulemaking to Reform Regulation of Incumbent Local Exchange Carrier Rates for Interstate Special Access Services.. 15-149-Commission Opens Docket for Proposed Transfer of Control of Time Warner Cable, Inc. and Charter Communications Inc. and Proposed Transfer of Control of Bright House Networks from Advance/Newhouse Partnership to Charter Communications Inc. 15-64-Final Report of the Downloadable Security Technology Advisory Committee 15-247-Investigation of Certain Price Cap Local Exchange Carrier Business Data Services Tariff Pricing Plans 13-5-Task Force-related ex partes RM-11358-Amend Certain Part 51 Rules
House of Representatives General lobbying related to the 1996 Telecommunications Act, specifically Title 2 provisions regarding "last mile and interconnection" General lobbying on congressional examination of the Communications Act of 1934, including the 1996 Telecommunications Act General lobbying in opposition to HR 2666 - No Rate Regulation of Broadband Internet Access General lobbying on video reform - specifically program access, retransmission consent General lobbying in support of a competitive navigation standard proposed by the DSTAC under Section 106(d) of the Satellite Television Extension and Localism Act Reauthorization Act of 2014 (STELAR) regarding FCC action on MB Docket No. 16-42: NPRM and Memorandum Opinion and Order-Expanding Consumers Video Navigation Choices). Draft Broadband Deployment legislation - specifically Section 3 related to pole attachments General lobbying related to special access regarding FCC action on Docket No. 15-247 (Investigation of Certain Price Cap Local Exchange Carrier Business Data Services Tariff Pricing Plans) and Docket No. 05-25 (In the Matter of Special Access Rates for Price Cap Local Exchange Carriers AT&T Corp. Petition for Rulemaking to Reform Regulation of Incumbent Local Exchange Carrier Rates for Interstate Special Access Services).
Senate General lobbying related to the 1996 Telecommunications Act, specifically Title 2 provisions regarding "last mile and interconnection" General lobbying on video reform - specifically program access, retransmission consent General lobbying in support of a competitive navigation standard proposed by the DSTAC under Section 106(d) of the Satellite Television Extension and Localism Act Reauthorization Act of 2014 (STELAR) regarding FCC action on MB Docket No. 16-42: NPRM and Memorandum Opinion and Order-Expanding Consumers Video Navigation Choices). General lobbying related to special access regarding FCC action on Docket No. 15-247 (Investigation of Certain Price Cap Local Exchange Carrier Business Data Services Tariff Pricing Plans) and Docket No. 05-25 (In the Matter of Special Access Rates for Price Cap Local Exchange Carriers AT&T Corp. Petition for Rulemaking to Reform Regulation of Incumbent Local Exchange Carrier Rates for Interstate Special Access Services).

ali_info.federal_agencies: U.S. SENATE, U.S. HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES, Federal Communications Commission (FCC)
